channel.title: Doors opening and closing

item.title: Doors opening and closing
item.dc:creator: @r_r_r r r r
item.description:
@r_r_r wrote:

ok so this is my code

if(objectID == 6106 && objectX == 2848 && objectY == 10187){ ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, objectID, -2, 0); }
Now how would I make it so when the door opens i can shut it, right now it doesnt shut it only opens it. Then I try this

if(objectID == 6106 && objectX == 2848 && objectY == 10187){ ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, objectID, -2, 0); } else if(objectID == 6106 && objectX == 2848 && objectY == 10187){ ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, objectID, 2, 0); }
But that Didnt work. So what do I do?

Read full topic
